text: Hong Kong competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome, Italy. Four competitors, all men, took part in three events in two sports. ==Shooting== Three shooters represented Hong Kong in 1960. ;50 m pistol * William Gillies ;50 m rifle, prone * Peter Rull, Sr. * Henry Souza ==Swimming== * Cheung Kin Man (1932 Borneo -?) 100 m Free Style ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1960 Summer Olympics 1960 Summer Olympics Category:1960 in Hong Kong sport
title: Hong Kong at the 1960 Summer Olympics
